jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
A Business Intelligence Data Warehouse Developer’s objective is to facilitate the flow of quality data to the data warehouse and maintain its integrity and reliability so that analysts and business users can use reliable data to make decisions. BigQuery is our current data warehouse solution where we gather the data from all of Gojek’s microservices for better data discovery experience and to get new insight for business analysis. We use Airflow as a scheduler and dependency management solution for all BI jobs at various frequencies. Plus Google Deployment Manager and Docker for provisioning and application management solution.

The tech stack that we use is dynamic and we’re always open to other well-researched solutions. You are also expected to liaise with the wider Business Intelligence Data Warehouse Developer and data warehouse team in Indonesia to leverage on their knowledge and implementations and contribute to the overall competencies of Gojek BI as a centre of excellence in Gojek.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Become a bridge communication between product or system engineers with business users or analysts from Singapore team.
  • Productinise ETL jobs with standardized scripts and tech stacks from HQ’s BI engineers.
  • Monitor Production & actively and independently debug issues in Production.
  • Research and conduct POC on the tech stacks to improve current infra, data pipelines with HQ’s BI engineers.
  • Collaborate with HQ BI Team to share best practices, in terms of engineering and workflow, and standardize those practices throughout services.
  • Have data quality, data cataloging, and data management in mind on every development.
  • Diligent in documenting any development so can easily be shared with engineers in your team or other local/ HQ teams.

• 2+ year experience in Data Environment (Analyst or Engineering)
  • Expert in SQL and Data Warehouse Concept
  • Expert in at least one programming language, especially Python or Go or Java
  • Proficient in Batch, real-time data processing, Data Modelling concept, and implementation
  • Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data to understand what’s happening and define & measure success on every project
  • You’re passionate about your customers and always bring questions back to what will serve them best
  • You know how to work with agile product development teams and are excited about identifying new ways to help your team be effective
